hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Song of Time Block Room

GC (Maze).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #Epona's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly Basement Switch Room Pot 1

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Magic Meter#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Fairy Bottle#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #6# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.
